name: invoice-parser-system
description: Unified Invoice Parser: Next.js + Express + Python LLM

scripts.dev: concurrently -n "NEXT,EXPRESS,PYTHON" -c "cyan,magenta,yellow" "npm run dev:next" "npm run dev:express" "npm run dev:python"
scripts.install:all: npm run install:next && npm run install:express && npm run install:python
scripts.build: npm run build:next && npm run build:express
scripts.start: concurrently -n "NEXT,EXPRESS,PYTHON" -c "cyan,magenta,yellow" "npm run start:next" "npm run start:express" "npm run start:python"
scripts.clean: npm run clean:next && npm run clean:express && npm run clean:python
scripts.clean:python: cd llm-server && find . -type d -name __pycache__ -exec rm -rf {} + && rm -rf .pytest_cache
scripts.lint: npm run lint:next && npm run lint:express && npm run lint:python
scripts.test: npm run test:next && npm run test:express && npm run test:python
